Data

Class PromotionalPackage

  • java.lang.Object
    • Data.PromotionalPackage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class PromotionalPackage
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class implements the Promotional Package entity with the attributes id, name, price, removed, listOfPackageItem. This class represents an Promotional Package. This entity class is Serializable. Allowing this entity to be written as an object into a text file.
    Since:
    24th October 2014
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Adrian Wang Wenjie
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
